  1. TOC {:toc}

Name: research_data
Description: Stores the core metadata of all studies (DOI, title, authors, publication date, etc.) for the RED-X App
Classification: RDF212
Schema package SAID: ECETPh-7kyOI9AKpKvJbRcAMI3_owHV2oAUfRSdjTalI
